NodeIsDefaultNamespace.summary:
The isDefaultNamespace() method of the interface accepts a namespace URI as an argument.
It returns a boolean value that is true if the namespace is the default namespace on the given node and false if not.

blockquote.para: Note: The default namespace of an HTML element is always "". For a SVG element, it is set by the xmlns attribute.

NodeIsDefaultNamespace.returns: A boolean value that holds the return value true or false, indicating if the parameter is the default namespace, or not.
